properties.comment: These are the preamble snippets needed for handling the integer sort
properties.entry: (assert (forall ((i Int)) (= (u2i (i2u i)) i))) (assert (forall ((x U)) (=> (instanceof x sort_int) (= (i2u (u2i x)) x)))) (assert (forall ((i Int)) (= (typeof (i2u i)) sort_int)))
(declare-fun u2i (U) Int) (declare-fun i2u (Int) U) (declare-const sort_int T)
